description: This Python script initializes a vector database with PDF URLs and metadata, sets up a knowledge base, creates an agent for querying, and performs asynchronous loading and querying operations related to recipes and cuisines.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an agent capable of performing knowledge-based queries.

classes.name: PDFUrlKnowledgeBase
classes.description: A class representing a knowledge base initialized with PDF URLs and associated metadata.

classes.name: LanceDb
classes.description: A class representing a LanceDB vector database for storing and querying vector data.

methods.name: aload
methods.description: Asynchronously loads data into the knowledge base, recreating the database if specified.

methods.name: aprint_response
methods.description: Asynchronously generates a response based on a query, with optional knowledge filters and markdown formatting.
